dossiers.title: The Arrest of Suresh Sallay: Easter Sunday Attacks Political Dossier
dossiers.description: A deep investigation into the arrest of intelligence operative Suresh Sallay, the Easter Sunday bombings conspiracy, and the political machinations connecting Sri Lanka's intelligence apparatus to the worst terrorist attack in the nation's history.

dossiers.title: The Death of Sri Lankan Cricket: Politics, Mafia & The Road to Ruin
dossiers.description: How political patronage, a "cricket mafia", toxic fan culture, and systemic institutional rot destroyed a once-proud cricketing nation — and why the new government appears powerless to fix it.

dossiers.title: Case File: The Conduct Files — KalathmaGate & Player Misconduct
dossiers.description: Documented allegations of player misconduct, the KalathmaGate incident involving Dhanushka Gunathilaka, and Sri Lanka Cricket's pattern of institutional silence and cover-up. Restricted access — verified sources only.

dossiers.title: SLC Power Network Board — Interactive Political Map
dossiers.description: Full interactive diagram of SLC's patronage flows, political family trees, financial linkages, and the cross-institutional capture that has kept the same network in power since the 1990s.
